com.se.simplicity.vector
Class SimpleRGBColourVectorf4

java.lang.Object
  com.se.simplicity.vector.ArrayBackedObjectf
      com.se.simplicity.vector.SimpleVectorf4
          com.se.simplicity.vector.SimpleRGBColourVectorf4
All Implemented Interfaces:
RGBColourVectorf, Vectorf, java.io.Serializable
public class SimpleRGBColourVectorf4
extends SimpleVectorf4
implements RGBColourVectorf

A 4 dimensional colour vector that stores its data in a float array.

Author:
Gary Buyn
See Also:
